Summary: Group of lights moving west high over Portland Ore.
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around August 3rd 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsI observed a series of dim lights moving together in a straight line path movingat what appeared to be the same speed as most other commercial aircraft flyingat cruising altitude. The lights moved from East to West over the period ofabout 1-2 minutes. Because they were so dim I lost track of them in the lightpollution over Portland. What intrigued me was that the set of 4-5 lights movedtogether in a straight line and then gradually change into a sort of echelonleft formation as they moved overhead so I knew it could not be one largeaircraft. The lights were dim, but they did not appear to be like otheraircraft lights in that they had a dull glow around them instead of a brightcenter, or pinpoint light like most airdraft lights at high altitude. The otherthing that appeared unusual was the closeness of the lights. Except for thechange in formation and its uniform appearance I could speculate that this mighthave been a meteor skimming the atmosphere or entering the atmosphere. I mightspeculate it was a formation of military aircraft, but it appeared that theaircraft were very close.Well, I appreciate having the chance to report my data and I hope someone got abetter look at them.
